Container.Name: Teedy-docs

Branch.TagDescription: Master branch, can be unstable. Not recommended for production use

Container.Overview:
Teedy is an open-source, lightweight document management system (DMS) for individuals and businesses.
The default admin password is "admin". Don't forget to change it before going to production.
Container.Description:
Teedy is an open-source, lightweight document management system (DMS) for individuals and businesses.
The default admin password is "admin". Don't forget to change it before going to production.

Config.Name: DOCS_BASE_URL
Config.Description: For using an external URL, for example https://teedy.mycompany.com
